message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. It's a valuable asset, and I believe this price reflects its worth.  Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I think it's a bit high. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.

Bob, I understand your position. While $1200000 is a good offer, it's a bit lower than what I'm hoping for. I'm willing to come down to $1300000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm confident we can reach a deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $1300000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $1150000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll lower the price to $1250000. This is a significant compromise, and I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value. I'm open to finalizing the deal at this price.  If this doesn't work for you, I might have to consider selling to another buyer.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Bob, I'm really trying to work with you here, but $1100000 is just too low for me. I'm willing to go down to $1200000. This is a final compromise on my part. If you don't accept this offer, I will have to consider selling the product to someone else. I'm hoping we can reach a deal that's mutually beneficial.

I understand that you're trying to reach a mutually beneficial deal, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1050000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
